title: early finish of getting the other files leaves residual progress bars behind - confusing UX
body:
Just reporting freshly observed oddity:
```shell
smaug:/mnt/scrap/tmp
$> datalad install -g http://github.com/ReproNim/containers
[INFO   ] Cloning http://github.com/ReproNim/containers [1 other candidates] into '/mnt/scrap/tmp/containers' 
[INFO   ]   Remote origin not usable by git-annex; setting annex-ignore                                         
install(ok): /mnt/scrap/tmp/containers (dataset)
Total (1 ok out of 5)  7%|███▍                                             | 1.26G/18.1G [00:20<04:16, 65.6MB/s]
images/bids/bids-freesurfer--6.0.1-5.sing:  12%|███▏                        | 316M/2.74G [00:19<03:11, 12.6MB/s]
images/bids/bids-fmriprep--1.3.2.sing:   7%|██                              | 317M/4.81G [00:19<04:32, 16.5MB/s]
images/bids/bids-mriqc--0.15.0.sing:  10%|███▍                              | 301M/2.93G [00:19<02:36, 16.8MB/s]
images/bids/bids-mrtrix3-connectome--0.4.1.sing:   4%|▉                     | 314M/7.57G [00:19<07:25, 16.3MB/s]
images/bids/bids-mrtrix3-connectome--0.4.1.sing:   1%|                     | 38.6M/7.57G [00:02<06:34, 19.1MB/s
```
note that the last two items are identical in filename and total size! that was confused me

That in this dataset there is indeed 5 files to be fetched:
```
$> find images -iname *.sing 
images/bids/bids-validator--1.2.3.sing
images/bids/bids-mriqc--0.15.0.sing
images/bids/bids-freesurfer--6.0.1-5.sing
images/bids/bids-fmriprep--1.3.2.sing
images/bids/bids-mrtrix3-connectome--0.4.1.sing
```
and I guess it quickly fetched one (so `1 ok` in total progress bar), removed that progress bar, which elevated other ones up, but there was a leftover left for that `images/bids/bids-mrtrix3-connectome--0.4.1.sing` on the screen, which made it look like a duplicate

after a while it became even more prominent:
```
$> datalad install -g http://github.com/ReproNim/containers
[INFO   ] Cloning http://github.com/ReproNim/containers [1 other candidates] into '/mnt/scrap/tmp/containers'
[INFO   ]   Remote origin not usable by git-annex; setting annex-ignore
install(ok): /mnt/scrap/tmp/containers (dataset)
Total (1 ok out of 5) 41%|████████████████████                             | 7.41G/18.1G [02:05<02:46, 64.1MB/s]Total (4 ok out of 5) 91%|████████████████████████████████████████████▍    | 16.4G/18.1G [06:10<02:00, 13.9MB/s]
images/bids/bids-mrtrix3-connectome--0.4.1.sing:  78%|████████████████▎    | 5.90G/7.57G [06:09<02:00, 13.9MB/s]
images/bids/bids-mrtrix3-connectome--0.4.1.sing:  68%|██████████████▏      | 5.13G/7.57G [05:26<01:45, 23.1MB/s]
images/bids/bids-mrtrix3-connectome--0.4.1.sing:  40%|████████▍            | 3.03G/7.57G [03:20<03:23, 22.3MB/s]
images/bids/bids-mrtrix3-connectome--0.4.1.sing:  40%|████████▎            | 3.00G/7.57G [03:19<03:51, 19.7MB/s
```
so we or tqdm should take care about cleaning up the other ones. I have datalad 0.12.0rc2.dev311 and tqdm 4.11.2-1~nd90+1. pip install upgrading tqdm to  4.31.1 didn't change anything
